subdisciplines.name: Global South Studies
subdisciplines.description: A subfield of postcolonial studies concerned with the cultures, politics, and economics of formerly colonized nations in Africa, Asia, Latin America, and the Caribbean.

subdisciplines.name: Black Studies
subdisciplines.description: An interdisciplinary field of study that seeks to understand African American experiences and critiques the racism and inequity that underlie them.

subdisciplines.name: Indigenous Studies
subdisciplines.description: A field of study that addresses the experiences and histories of Indigenous peoples around the world and critiques the settler colonialism and systemic oppression that they have endured.

subdisciplines.name: Feminist Postcolonial Studies
subdisciplines.description: An interdisciplinary field of study that examines the intersection of gender and colonialism and critiques the ways in which colonialism has perpetuated patriarchal power structures.
